title: Does the Word ‘Guacamole’ Mean ‘Testicle Sauce’?
subtitle: Both "avocado" and "guacamole" derive from the Nahuatl word for the fruit, which only secondarily carries the slang meaning of "testicle."
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: The word "guacamole" literally translates as "testicle sauce."
